discussion.p: It has been pointed out both on the LWG reflector and as editorial issue 3912 that the definition of "models" added in P2101R0 is not a model of clarity when a concept is defined in terms of other concepts.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to the post-Prague working draft preview.

blockquote.p:
-1- A sequence Args of template arguments is said to model a concept C if:
(?.?) — Args satisfies C ();
(?.?) — andArgs meets all semantic requirements (if any) given in the specification of C; and
(?.?) — every concept found to be satisfied as part of the satisfaction determination above is also modeled.
